attributes.action: Ban the practice and promotion of Scientology in Britain.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We in Britain take pride in our secular values and with this the freedom to adhere to any particular belief system that we so desire.
The BBC's recent Panorama documentary regarding the "Church" of Scientology, however, has shown that this particular "religion" is nothing more than a dangerous and fraudulent cult hiding under the thin veneer of an omnibenevolent self-help organization.
It is clear from this particular piece of film making as well as the personal accounts from thousands of ex-members that this cult poses a threat to the emotional, financial and general wellbeing of particularly vulnerable and/or misled members of our society in that it acts as a dangerous, mind controlling entity in its own right.
We, the aware and well informed members of British society, ask that this sinister practice be outlawed for the good of us all and without the hesitation that Her Majesty's government has shown on a range of other issues.
